dialog: Subtitles by explosiveskull www.OpenSubtitles.org Going somewhere warm?
Any laptops or iPads in your bag today?
Feet on the points and hands in the air, sir.
Gonna give you a quick patdown.
Pakistan International Airline, Flight PK891, baggage is at Carousel 5.
Mr. Arwan, for how long do you want the car?
Would you like the full insurance, Mr. Arwan?
Do you have duct tape? Tape?
I'm Asif, I'm a friend of Samira.
Samira and her family aren't here yet, or they would be here to welcome you themselves.
That one is her uncle's house.
Heh. Have you ever been to England?
No, but all my cousins live there.
He's saying, "Why didn't your parents teach you Punjabi?" I'm a very bad learner.
I need to go to Sialkot.
It's the silver Honda. That one.
People will be killed if you make a noise.
Hey. Hey, shut the fuck up. Hey.
I'm gonna put you inside the car, but don't scream.
You scream, you go back in the fucking boot, understand?
I'm gonna take your gag off as long as you don't scream.
Take the hood off and the ties.
All right, in two hours, we'll be in Lahore.
Two hours to decide if you wanna be with Deepesh.
If you don't, I'll put you out on the side of the road.
You'll be back with your family by lunchtime.
If you go to Deepesh, you'll always be on the run.
I don't want to be married.
Are you sure you wanna go back to Deepesh?
I'm gonna take your hood off.
We're gonna visit the Golden Temple in Amritsar, then on to Delhi and Rajasthan before we meet up with friends from London in Goa.
I wanna get a cab to the border.
You want to change Indian rupees?
You want to change Indian rupees?
You want to change Indian rupees?
You want to change Indian rupees?
You want to change Indian rupees?
We're from the UK, and we were going to Amritsar.
Come with me. Give me your bag.
No, we've got a hotel booked.
Just take us to the Golden Temple.
Sir, we have booking for him, but he has not arrived.
I wanna get your cheapest phone.
I'll buy five if you give me 500.
Yo, this is Deepesh, and obviously I'm busy right now.
But when you hear that beep, you know what's up.
How long have you known him?
This is the number I have for him.
It must be in my phone, but, oh, I left it in Younganabad.
I'm the person you were supposed to meet this morning.
I'm having to sort out a lot of things.
What the fuck are you talking about?
You were supposed to meet me here.
Is the person you're with okay?
We're getting on a train to Delhi.
Hey, how much is a ticket for Delhi?
express train for Delhi is leaving from Platform 5.
Platform 5, the 7 a.m. train for Delhi.
How much are you getting paid?
Five up front, In Delhi, we'll share a room, as man and wife.
I only have one passport for you.
If we're married, they'll just look at mine.
I'd like a room. Double room.
Yo, this is Deepesh, and obviously I'm busy right now.
Hey, don't call my UK phone.
Meet me at the Krishna Hotel in Paharganj in one hour, okay?
Look, he was gonna shoot me.
What's happening? You were supposed to be at Amritsar.
Walk down the street to your left.
Cross the road to a restaurant  called Hello Vegetarian.
I mean, why didn't you just say that in the first place?
Sit with your back facing the street.
Order me a tea, I'll be there.
If it's good, I'll call you.
I'll arrange a place for you to meet Samira.
The police are looking for her.
How long before they find us?
You should've thought about that earlier.
No, you should have done your fucking job.
It was supposed to be a random kidnapping.
Dump her in Karachi or Islamabad.
I leave it up to you.
Everything goes back to the way that it was.
That'll be a lot more work.
Everything's fucking money for you, isn't it?
No, but I can get it.
He doesn't want to see you.
If it's good, I'll call you.
I'll arrange a place for you to meet Samira.
The police are looking for her.
How long before they find us?
You should've thought about that earlier.
No, you should have done your fucking job.
It was supposed to be a random kidnapping.
Dump her in Karachi or Islamabad.
I leave it up to you.
Everything goes back to the way that it was.
You could say you never saw anyone.
You don't know how you got there.
Maybe they were gonna ask for a ransom, then they got frightened, so they decided to dump you.
Or I can tell them that you kidnapped me, give them your description, and tell them that Deepesh paid you.
You don't think Deepesh will tell them you were in on the deal?
So I go back to my family and get married?
I know a guy who could help.
I want you to rent an SUV.
Check in at a big hotel.
I need you to try one of those on.
I need to take a photo.
You should put your hair up.
You wanna get out of here, get some fresh air?
Is that why you're smoking it?
He told his family that he would go to India for a retreat or travel or something.
Basically, be out of contact for six months.
The family keeps the gems in a vault until they have a customer, and he had access to the vault.
So he made good copies of the stones.
Good enough to pass for real as long as they're not sold.
The plan was that he brought them here, and we would disappear.
Live off the money by selling the stones.
How many people knew about you and Deepesh?
No one knew about the plan.
Yeah, but about you and him being in love?
Our friends knew about us, but we kept it a secret from our family.
Why would they not want you to marry him? He's a rich boy.
I'm not going back without seeing him.
Excuse me, I'm looking for Nitin.
It is a real person and she's dead.
Good for hotels, jobs, police, maybe airlines.
Maybe okay for hotels and traffic cops.
Maybe by land, late at night...
You want a visa for somewhere?
If you were a rich tourist, wanted to get away from it all in a nice hotel near here,  where would you go?
Okay, pick me up at the Ghat gate in 30 minutes.
How the fuck did they get my name?
How would they not get your name?
I'm never gonna see you after this.
And you don't want to see me.
So that means I need all my money now.
I can get it by tomorrow.
Book a room at the Samode Palace.
She won't go back unless she's seen you.
I need her to cooperate to get her back there.
Drop me here, and be ready to leave your hotel by 10 tomorrow.
Can we go out for breakfast?
Have you been to India before?
Your parents let you come here?
Then you went off the rails.
And then I went crazy too.
Where the fuck have you been?
This life of crime suits you.
You are like a stuck record, man.
I'll leave you two lovebirds alone for a minute.
Do you think I don't know what's going on?
Think I don't know what you've been saying to him?
What shit has he been feeding you?
I know you're bullshitting me, okay?
The police are looking for me.
I get kidnapped, and no one would notice?
I just didn't think he was gonna fucking kill someone.
Paying extra to send me back to Pakistan to that marriage, like I'm some lost luggage.
Is that what she fucking told you?
Man, you are dumber than I thought.
But she always has got an angle.
Sounds like I shouldn't take her back to Pakistan, then, huh?
We could put him in the car.
Drive it off the road somewhere.
They'll be still looking for me.
Yeah, I have something for you.
We'll stay the night at the Samode Palace.
We'll let people know we're going to Nepal.
May I have your passport, please?
Mind if I look at a map?
If you could show me the best route to Nepal.
Hi, can I have a sewing kit, please?
There should be one in your room.
And to get down to Kathmandu, you have to go through Lucknow.
I thought we should look like we're on holiday together.
First stop, Jaipur, then on to Goa.
How much can I get for the car?
But they need to be used first in Delhi.
Then send them to Lucknow, use them there, then Kathmandu, then finish, okay?
We have a stone that we need to sell.
I need to make some calls.
It's in the street, just outside the Bank of India.
Why are we selling the stones?
We need money to live on.
It's too rich piece for me.
He don't have a buyer for this.
I don't have any buyer for this.
Where did you hide the diamonds?
In your dress or your jacket?
Don't you think we should put them somewhere safer?
Easy for you to keep an eye on it.
You'll notice if I take it off.
I have contacted the British consulate in Pakistan, and I have requested them to get involved.
Sounds like he wants you back.
How old were you when you left Pakistan?
It was only when we got to England that it all went wrong.
Listen, can I have some money?
I want to buy a phone.
If you just give me the 500 from the car?
If you need ID, use that.
Can I also have my British passport?
Don't worry, I'm not gonna run away.
We've got about eight more hours before we get to Goa.
Everyone living their own life in their own world.
It's the perfect place to get lost.
We're like two needles in our Indian haystack.
Can we get something to eat?
I'd like to rent a jeep.
How long would you like it for?
But I... I might extend it.
Can I have a license, please?
Okay, so who are you today?
I can't wait to go to the ocean to swim.
I'll teach you how to swim.
We're looking for somewhere to stay.
Where's the best place to start?
If you're looking for longterm, Maria has a lot.
In the jewelry shop down there, by the beach.
They've come to see the house.
Have a nice view from here.
If you need anything, I'm here.
Oh, fuck. Shit. Don't do that.
Are you coming swimming with me?
No one knows who you are.
If you need anything, call me.
